about_the_game:
This is the story of the journey of a daring adventurer and his encounter with seven beautiful maidens
After he makes the accidental mistake of encountering a forest guardian, the traveler finds himself in a fantastic adventure and meets new acquaintances. Will our hero be able to pass through thorny forests, frightening caves and terrifying mountains, fight monsters and bosses, and find the one for whom he set out on this journey?

A brief description of the game:
After completing several levels of the puzzle, a dialogue opens with the character, the outcome of which affects the subsequent animated CG scenes. In the animated CG scenes there is also a small mini game and customization of the girls

Game Features:
A fascinating story
Actions with consequences
Interesting puzzles
Visual novel
The game is translated into several languages
Unique characters
Improved Graphics
7 beautiful girls.
Your choice decides their fate
The game features animated CG scenes in ULTRA HD resolution
Control and interaction with animation
The character reputation system
There is character customization
Scenes include voice acting
